message.body: Hi, Americanprincess. Jurgen here. I'm about to start helping a friend w painting, so I can't chat till 2 or 3 pm.
Hi! That's fine. I'll be at a barbeque for a few hours in a place where i don't get a signal so if you text me when you're available I'll text you when i
leave there.
By the way have a happy memorial day!
Hi. I'm ok to chat now. You're probably@bbq now but if not â€¦:-)
Hi jurgen. I'm available to chat now. How was your day?
Mostly pretty good. I put on old clothes & a couple of friends from my synagogue picked me up. Then we drove across town to another co-congregant's hous
e, where two of us gave a room a first coat of paint while the third helped her lay flooring. You?
Wow you've been busy!
Then I got home& had lunch, and lay down on the couch to relax and play Words With Friends. With 6 millitons of cat on my chest. And fell asleep. :-)
So, how was your day?
The cook out was good. I left my phone there by accident and had to go back to get it
That's why it took so long to get back to you.
Do you flip houses?
I want to learn home remodeling so i can buy homes and fix them up.
Sounds like your co-congregant may simply be doing some remodeling of her home, not necessarily flipping her home.
What city are you in?
No I don't. She's moving -into our neighborhood, that'll be nice - and is prepping the old place for either rental or sale.
Philadelphia. You?
Glad you got your phone back!
Apart from forgetting your phone, how was the party/barbecue?
My day was pretty good. I spent it hanging out with family.
Cool. What part of the city is she moving to?
I'm in philly too.
I think she's up near NoLibs. This is West Philly.
Whereabouts?
Yeah me too. I don't have a landline so it's hard to call people without my cell. I really missed it!
It was fun. I saw people i haven't seen in years.
I ate too much too.
Did you all complete the job? Was it only one day's work?
Isn't that what family parties are for? (^_^)
Near wynnewood.
Lol yeah that's the best part. Everything tasted so good!
I was losing weight for a while. I think it all came back today. Lol
nt times.
ybe the end of May. We were there about 10:30-1:40. One of her former neighbors came by as well, + another synagogue member. So bunches of ppl at affere
No, there's more to do, but it wasn't just us. She sent out a "time exchange" message on our Facebook page for last Friday thru ...I'm not sure when, ma
DIFFERENT
ily calorie target.
I'm trying to lose weight. I have a pretty good calorie tracker on my Android. I've been at out for nearly 2mos now, and I'm just beginning to hit my da
When you say time exchange how does the exchange part work?
Wow that sounds intense. Is it a rigid regimen that you're on?
I wish you the best of luck with it.
Not rigid, no. It's no program. I just picked an target, to lose 20lb in w few months.
Thank you.
I usually snack on healthy foods, eat small meals, cook my own food and eat less in general and it makes me lose weight.
I wasn't actually trying to. It just happens but i like the results.
Well congrats on meeting your goal calorie wise!
My stomach has shrunk so all the food i ate today has made my stomach hurt. It's like thanksgiving!
Are you male or female? I'm a female.
Your username is interesting. What does it mean?
You don't have to answer if you don't want. I was just curious.
Let's talk about something else. Do you have any hobbies that you do often?
I like learning languages and traveling. I also like learning to play the piano.
& linguistics.
Which segues to your other question. I love reading, especially fantasy & science fiction. And I love music, especially folk music. And I love languages
a heap, all stamped 9:58.
I had the cell phone powered down to recharge, from about 8-10:00, as I said I would. Then when I turned it on again, your last 7 texts all came thru in
